question: Who offers to dance with Katie?

question: Why is the boat able to be claimed by anyone?
answers: The boat floats in international waters so it doesn't belong to any one country.
Because it is in International Waters.

answers: That it contains a large amount of gold.
That it has a lot of gold onboard.

to use it as a trap and keep collecting souls
